data.name: SettingsForm_Group_RollingInterval_ToolTip
data.value: The rolling interval, a faithful timekeeper, orchestrates the cadence of new log file birth. By choosing the 'Day' setting, you empower a diligent log file maestro to compose a fresh symphony each day – unfailingly, much like the punctual arrival of your morning cup o' joe.

data.name: SettingsForm_Button_OpenLog_ToolTip
data.value: Venture forth, noble user, into the realm of log files, where revelations and digital wisdom await your discerning gaze.

data.name: SettingsForm_Button_CleanLog_TootlTip
data.value: The moment has arrived to flex your digital muscles and purge the logs from the Serilog directory. But heed this friendly reminder – with such might comes a burden of accountability.

data.name: SettingsForm_LogFileLimit_ToolTip
data.value: Imposing a cap on lingering log files keeps our digital abode spick and span. This trusty safeguard ensures we're not engulfed in a tidal wave of log file mayhem, preserving order amidst the ebb and flow of data.

data.name: SettingsForm_BtnOpenLog_ErrorMessage
data.value: A wee hiccup has emerged, for the elusive log directory path is playing a game of digital hide-and-seek.

data.name: SettingsForm_BtnCleanLog_Confirm_Message
data.value: Hold your horses and ponder with caution before hitting that 'delete' button on these log files. Be mindful that, much like a digital black hole, deletion is a point of no return; once gone, they're lost in the void forever.

data.name: RibbonButtonSuperTip_Home
data.value: Escape the soul-sucking office life and dive headfirst into the Rizone! Click to teleport into Rizonesoft's madhouse of software sorcery, where the wizards wear code-laden capes and throw digital confetti.

data.name: Toast_LanguageChanged
data.value: We've updated our language settings and injected a bit of linguistic wizardry into your Rizonesoft Office experience. To ensure that our witty wordplay and sarcastic undertones don't get lost in translation, we kindly ask you to restart any open programs.

data.name: ExceptionForm_Privacy_Notice
data.value: With our unwavering commitment to your privacy, we assure you that your personal information is safe and secure. We do not gather any unnecessary data and uphold stringent measures to protect the integrity of your personal details.

data.name: ExceptionForm_Description
data.value: Oops! It appears our over-caffeinated developers, in their java-induced frenzy, might have overlooked a minor detail. We get it, this isn't the perfect time for you to be playing detective. But if you can spare a moment from rolling your eyes, your assistance in pinpointing this elusive bug would mean the world to us.

data.name: LoadLanguages_Error
data.value: Our language data has taken a most unexpected sabbatical, leaving us in a temporary state of conversational limbo.

data.name: Language_CultureInfo_Error
data.value: In the midst of storing our linguistic data, we've encountered an unanticipated glitch in the matrix. To debug this conundrum, we suggest delving into the log file's trove of information. With your help, we'll rectify the anomaly and optimize our code for seamless performance!

data.name: Language_DropDown_Error
data.value: While we were busy building the language Drop Down menu, an unexpected issue snuck in uninvited. Rest assured, our dependable log file serves as our detective, equipped with a magnifying glass, ready to uncover the root cause of this disturbance.

data.name: Toast_AppDataPathError
data.value: We've stumbled upon a glitch in the matrix as our program configuration loading quest hit a bump. Worry not, we've diligently jotted down this mischievous anomaly for posterity.

data.name: SettingsForm_lblLocalDescription
data.value: Choose a language from the list on the right, and keep your fingers crossed that our developers did their job. If your favored tongue is amiss, fret not, for we'll soon expand our linguistic horizons to encompass it in the not-too-distant future.

data.name: RibbonButtonSuperTip_Settings
data.value: Personalize Rizonesoft Office to fit your needs. Because one size does not always fit all.

data.name: RibbonButtonSuperTip_Language
data.value: Embark on a linguistic adventure – Effortlessly switch interface languages and relish the delightful essence each one brings to your digital escapades.

data.name: OfficeUpdate_Message
data.value: Be the first to explore the new Rizonesoft Office version ({0}). Update available now.

data.name: RibbonButtonSuperTip_ToggleMode
data.value: Switch between Dark or Light Theme.

data.name: RibbonButtonSuperTip_HelpDocs
data.value: Your guide on how to efficiently use Rizonesoft Office. Find step-by-step instructions, learn about useful features, and discover valuable tips and tricks to optimize your productivity.

data.name: RibbonButtonSuperTip_Support
data.value: Found a bug? Let us know so that we can do better

data.name: RibbonButtonSuperTip_Update
data.value: Unlock new possibilities! Be the first to explore the new Rizonesoft Office version.

data.name: LicenseForm_ThanksLabel
data.value: We greatly appreciate your continued support. We are pleased to inform you that all previously disabled features are now permanently enabled. For dedicated support, please don't hesitate to reach out to our team at support@rizonetech.com. We encourage you to recommend the Rizonesoft Office Suite to your colleagues and friends. Thank you for choosing us as your preferred software provider.

data.name: LicenseForm_LicenseValid_Message
data.value: Well, look at you with your fancy valid license key! You're all set to enjoy our premium features. Happy exploring!

data.name: LicenseForm_LicenseInValid_Message
data.value: Oh, this is awkward... That license key doesn't seem to be on the guest list. Are you sure it's not from a cereal box or something? If you think this is a mistake, our support team is ready to sort this out.

data.name: LicenseForm_LicenseError_Message
data.value: Wow, that's not even in the same neighborhood as a valid license key! If this is a joke, we're definitely missing the punchline. If it's not, our support team is ready to help you find your way.

data.name: LicenseForm_ThanksLabel_NotRegistered
data.value: Welcome to {0} {1} License Activation! Here, you can enter your license key to unlock all the fantastic features of our application. If you've already got a key, pop it into the text box and hit 'Activate'. If your key is valid, you'll be all set to enjoy our premium features. Don't have a license key yet? Click here to get one.

data.name: RibbonButtonSuperTip_GetLicense
data.value: Purchase or Acquire a New License

data.name: RibbonButtonSuperTip_Donate
data.value: Your generous support, big or small, will make a significant impact.

data.name: RibbonButtonSuperTip_Exception
data.value: Press for a deliberate chaos creation
